active_item.title: Reconcile blocked items that already produced deliverables
active_item.description: Audit the bootstrap-incident requeued/blocked items against existing docs/tests/outbox evidence and normalize backlog state so completed work is marked completed and only real residual deltas remain queued/blocked.
acceptance_criteria: Disposition is recorded for RK-M1-0001, RK-M1-0002, RK-M0-0002, and RK-M0-0003 (completed if acceptance is met, otherwise requeued as scoped delta work)
Backlog files reflect an audit trail explaining each disposition without recreating escalation-chain churn
python tools/orchestrator.py status runs successfully after backlog normalization
